item.title: Submission
item.description: Welcome back! We hope the journey of participating in Periyar’s 146th birthday event has been thrilling!

item.title: Donate Now
item.description: Show Your Appreciation for Periyar with a Donation You can support Periyar’s mission by making a donation.

item.title: Drawing Competition
item.description: As part of the Periyar birthday celebration, we invite you to showcase your artistic talent by drawing or painting a picture or cartoon that reflects themes of Social Justice, Equality, Women Empowerment, Humanism, and Futuristic Scientific Inventions.

item.title: How To Setup Meghna Hugo
item.description: Install this template by following those simple steps: STEP-1 : Hugo installation Check this link below for install hugo on your computer.

item.title: Run/Walk For Periyar
item.description: Honor the legacy of Periyar by participating in our “Run or Walk for Periyar” event! This event encourages you to walk or run a set distance using your preferred online fitness app.

item.title: Speech Contest
item.description: “Speech is power: speech is to persuade, to convert, to compel.” â€” Ralph Waldo Emerson, an American essayist and lecturer

item.title: Essay Writing
item.description: The Periyar birth anniversary celebratory event encourages you to bring out the writer in you. This is your chance to influence others through your words, as written words hold stronger emphasis compared to spoken words.

item.title: Kahoot - Periyar 1000
item.description: Dressed as iconic Dravidian leaders, our children don’t just put on costumes; they step into a rich tapestry of experiences.

item.title: Kahoot Quiz
item.description: Join us for an exciting Kahoot quiz, that will challenge your knowledge of the book “Periyar 1000”!

item.title: Parai Music
item.description: Unleash the power of traditional rhythms with our ‘Parai Music’ competition! Let your beats echo the rich cultural heritage of TamilNadu and captivate the audience.

item.title: Singing Contest
item.description: Participate in the celebration of Periyar’s ideals by sharing your vocal talent. Singing a song isn’t just about the melody; it’s about expressing your thoughts, emotions, and messages through the power of music.

item.title: K Veeramani Award
item.description: K. VEERAMANI AWARD FOR SOCIAL JUSTICE has been instituted by the nonresident Indian (NRI) followers of Periyar E.

item.title: Our Mission
item.description: Periyar International is dedicated to spreading the humanistic ideas of Periyar E.V. Ramasamy to the world.
